Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires dealers to provide written notice that a motor vehicle for sale is missing an airbag
Summary: Requires dealers to provide written notice that a motor vehicle for sale is missing an airbag.
LawCode: Add ยง349-e-1, Gen Bus L; amd ยง301, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring dealers to provide written notice that a motor vehicle for sale is missing an airbag
